container.description: Here, you can define some advanced settings or consult informations about the extension. Don't forget to click on Validate to save your settings!
container.labelList: List of web page/site to exclude (one element per line):
container.titleHelp: Example: if you enter http://www.example.com, Page Shadow will ignore all the website. If you enter http://www.example.com/repertoire1/, only this folder and the sub-folders will be ignored. If you enter http://www.example.com/repertoire1/index.php, only this page will be ignored. If you enter index, all URLs containing this word will be ignored.
container.indiceList: The websites addresses entered below will be ignored by Page Shadow.

about.title: About Page Shadow
about.description: Page Shadow is available for Firefox, Chrome and Opera. This extension have been realised by Eliastik

changelog.2:
• Firefox support
  • New graphical theme based on Bootstrap
  • Adding night mode
  • Various fixes (bugs, texts)
changelog.121:
• Fixed bug in the advanced settings
  • Adding informations about the extension in the advanced settings
changelog.12:
• Optimisation of the popup layout
  • Improved function "Increase page contrast". The transparent images are now supported
  • Some adjustements
